sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均有"想要，打算"之意。
means: intend ： 较正式用词，但常用，指对未来的行动做出打算，并力争实现。
mean ： 口语多用，指怀有作某事的想法或希望得到某物，特别用于效果不好而动机良好的场合。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"卑鄙的，卑贱的，卑下的"之意。
means: low ： 指行为卑鄙、可耻、下文明，可引申指庸俗。
mean ： 暗示狠毒、贪婪、缺乏尊严感等为人们所不耻的卑鄙、自私、渺小的行为。
cheap ： 侧旨人或物的品质低劣下贱。
shabby ： 指行为的不公和卑劣而使人感到不屑和轻蔑。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"表示……的意思"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: mean, imply, indicate, represent, denote, signify, suggest
means: mean ： 最普通用词。指文字或符号等所表示的各种明确的或含蓄的意义。
imply ： 侧重用文字或符号表示的联想，暗示。
denote ： 指某一词字面或狭义的意思，或指某些符号或迹象的特指含义。
signify ： 指用文字、说话或表情等表示单纯的意思。
suggest ： 通常指暗含地、隐晦地表达意思。

word_mean: 平均数：在某种意义上代表一组数字的中值的数
均值：在概率和统计中，指随机变量的期望值，即随着样本数的无限增加(如果存在极限)，样本均值趋向集中到的一个极限值，符号为μ

sentence.Network_en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentence.Network_cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentence.Network_en: "What do you mean?" I asked, offended on Liddie's behalf.
sentence.Network_cn: “你什么意思啊？”我问，替利迪感到愤愤不平。

sentence.Network_en: This will mean more remand prisoners being held in police cells.
sentence.Network_cn: 这将意味着更多候审犯人会被拘押在警局拘留室。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 平均值 (average) 也被称为平均值 (mean)。若要计算某行中两列或多列中数字的平均值，需使用 AVERAGE 函数。
dengfei04 的博客 - 事不关己 - 网易博客 ... median 中位数 mean 平均数 var 方差.
数学英文_百度文库 ... mode 众数 mean 平均 median 中值.
意字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 意味〖 meaning;significance;implication〗 意味着〖 mean;signify;imply〗 意想〖 imagine〗.

list.abs: 明纬(广州)电子有限公司目前负责明纬(MEAN WELL)开关电源产品的制造生产及国内外客户销售服务与技术支持。明纬(广州)电子有 …
石油词汇英语翻译(M)--石油百科 ... mean indication pressure 平均指示压力 mean life 平均寿命 mean lifetime 平均寿命.
贱女孩(Mean Girls)……美国青春校园版《金枝欲孽》 ====================================== 纽约时刻(New York Minute)…
一个观测值同规定值之间的偏差。5.5 平均偏差(mean deviation)各观测值与其算术平均值的绝对偏差(即偏差的绝对值)的平均值。.

jx.jx_en_mean: used to clarify or correct a statement or to introduce a justification or explanation
jx.jx_cn_mean: 我想，我说，我的意思是（用于澄清或纠正，或用于提出理由、解释）

lj.lj_ly: I mean, it's not as if I owned property.
lj.lj_ls: 我想说，我真的没有财产。

jx.jx_en_mean: [usu. in questions]really admit or intend to say

lj.lj_ly: do you mean to say you've uncovered something new?.
lj.lj_ls: 你是不是想说你有新的发现？。

jx.jx_en_mean: have good intentions, but not always the ability to carry them out
jx.jx_cn_mean: 用意是好的，初衷是好的

jx.jx_en_mean: used in reference to a socially deprived area of a city, or one which is noted for violence and crime
jx.jx_cn_mean: 贫民街区；治安混乱的城区

lj.lj_ly: the mean streets of the South Bronx.
lj.lj_ls: 南布朗克斯的贫民街区。

jx.jx_en_mean: denoting something very good of its kind
In any way possible; in any case
jx.jx_cn_mean: 用尽各种可能的办法；无论如何

lj.lj_ly: not by any means an easy opponent.
lj.lj_ls: 无论如何也不是一个容易的对手

jx.jx_en_mean: With the use of; owing to

lj.lj_ly: They succeeded by means of patience and sacrifice.
lj.lj_ls: 他们靠耐心和牺牲而取得了成功

lj.lj_ly: This remark by no means should be taken lightly.
lj.lj_ls: 这次讲话绝不能等闲视之

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English mænan, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch meenen and German meinen, from an Indo-European root shared by mind

Middle English, shortening of Old English gemǣne, of Germanic origin, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin communis 'common'. The original sense was 'common to two or more persons', later 'inferior in rank', leading to sense 3 and a sense 'ignoble, small-minded', from which senses 1 and 2 (which became common in the 19th cent.) arose
Middle English: from Old French meien, from Latin medianus 'middle' (see median)

entry.tran: 意思是;表示…的意思;作…解释
entry.def: If you want to know what a word, code, signal, or gesture means, you want to know what it refers to or what its message is.

example.ex: In modern Welsh, 'glas' means 'blue'...
example.tran: 在现代威尔士语中，glas 意为“蓝色”。

example.ex: What does 'evidence' mean?...
example.tran: evidence 是什么意思？

entry.def: If you ask someone what they mean, you are asking them to explain exactly what or who they are referring to or what they are intending to say.

example.ex: Do you mean me?...
example.tran: 你指的是我吗？

example.ex: Let me illustrate what I mean with an old story...
example.tran: 让我用一个古老的故事来说明我的意思吧。

entry.tran: (某事)对(某人)很重要，要紧,意义重大
entry.def: If something means something to you, it is important to you in some way.

example.ex: The idea that she witnessed this shameful incident meant nothing to him...
example.tran: 虽然她目睹了这可耻的一幕，但是这对他来说无关紧要。

example.ex: It would mean a lot to them to win.
example.tran: 获胜对他们来说非常重要。

entry.def: If one thing means another, it shows that the second thing  exists or is true.

example.ex: An enlarged prostate does not necessarily mean cancer...
example.tran: 前列腺肿大不一定就是癌症。

example.ex: Just because he has a beard doesn't necessarily mean he's a hippy.
example.tran: 不能因为他蓄须就说他是嬉皮士。

entry.def: If one thing means another, the first thing leads to the second thing happening.

example.ex: It would almost certainly mean the end of NATO...
example.tran: 这几乎肯定会导致北大西洋公约组织的终结。

example.ex: Trade and product discounts can also mean big savings...
example.tran: 商品促销与产品折扣同样意味着可能会省下一大笔钱。

entry.def: If doing one thing means doing another, it involves doing the second thing.

example.ex: Children universally prefer to live in peace and security, even if that means living with only one parent...
example.tran: 孩子们普遍愿意过平静安宁的生活，即便这意味着只能与单亲生活在一起。

example.ex: Managing well means communicating well.
example.tran: 良好的管理需要有效的沟通。

entry.def: If you say that you mean what you are saying, you are telling someone that you are serious about it and are not joking, exaggerating, or just being polite.

example.ex: He says you're fired if you're not back at work on Friday. And I think he meant it...
example.tran: 他说，如果你星期五还不回去上班的话就解雇你。我想他是当真的。

example.ex: He could see I meant what I said. So he took his fur coat and left.
example.tran: 他看得出我并非只是说说而已，于是拿起他的皮衣走了。

entry.def: If you say that someone meant to do something, you are saying that they did it deliberately.

example.ex: I didn't mean to hurt you...
example.tran: 我无意伤害你。

example.ex: If that sounds harsh, it is meant to...
example.tran: 如果这么说听起来刺耳的话，那目的就达到了。

entry.def: If you say that someone did not mean any harm, offence, or disrespect, you are saying that they did not intend to upset or offend people or to cause problems, even though they may in fact have done so.

example.ex: I'm sure he didn't mean any harm...
example.tran: 我相信他并无恶意。

example.ex: I didn't mean any offence. It was a flippant, off-the-cuff remark.
example.tran: 我本无意冒犯，那不过是句脱口而出的冒失话。

entry.def: If you mean to do something, you intend or plan to do it.

example.ex: Summer is the perfect time to catch up on the new books you meant to read...
example.tran: 夏天是把想读却没读的新书恶补一下的最佳时机。

example.ex: You know very well what I meant to say...
example.tran: 你非常清楚我想说什么。

entry.def: If you say that something was meant to happen, you believe that it was made to happen by God or fate, and did not just happen  by chance.

example.ex: John was constantly reassuring me that we were meant to be together.
example.tran: 约翰不断安慰我说，我们注定要在一起。

entry.tran: 我的意思是，也就是说（用于使表述更加清楚）
entry.def: You say 'I mean' when making clearer something that you have just said.

example.ex: It was his idea. Gordon's, I mean...
example.tran: 这是他的主意，我是指戈登。

example.ex: Is something upsetting you—I mean, apart from this business?
example.tran: 有什么烦心事吗？我的意思是，除了这件事以外还有吗？

entry.tran: (用于引出主张，尤指证明自己刚才所说的话)
entry.def: You can use 'I mean' to introduce a statement, especially one that justifies something that you have just said.

example.ex: I'm sure he wouldn't mind. I mean, I was the one who asked him...
example.tran: 我肯定他不会在意的，因为是我问他的。

example.ex: They were filled with racial stereotypes, I mean, it looked like something from the 1930s.
example.tran: 他们满脑子种族成见，似乎都是些20世纪30年代的老思想。

entry.tran: 我的意思是(用于纠正之前所说的话)
entry.def: You say I mean when correcting something that you have just said.

example.ex: It was law or classics—I mean English or classics.
example.tran: 是法律或者古典文学——我的意思是英语或古典文学。

entry.tran: 理解…的滋味;了解…的影响
entry.def: If you know what it means to do  something, you know everything that is involved in a particular activity or experience, especially the effect that it has on you.

example.ex: I know what it means to lose a child under such tragic circumstances.
example.tran: 我明白在这种悲惨的情况下失去孩子的滋味。

entry.def: If a name, word, or phrase means something to you, you have heard it before and you know what it refers to.

example.ex: 'Oh, Gairdner,' he said, as if that meant something to him...
example.tran: “哦，盖尔德纳，”他说道，好像他听说过这个名字。

example.ex: Does the word 'Fareham' mean anything to anyone?
example.tran: 有人对 Fareham 这个词有印象吗？

entry.def: If you say that someone means well, you mean they are trying to be kind and helpful, even though they might be causing someone problems or upsetting them.

example.ex: I know you mean well, but I can manage by myself.
example.tran: 我明白您的好意，不过我自己能行。

entry.tran: (疑问句中用于询问对方自己的理解是否正确)你是说
entry.def: You use 'you mean' in a question to check that you have understood what someone has said.

example.ex: What accident? You mean Christina's?...
example.tran: 哪次事故？你是说克里斯蒂娜的那次？

example.ex: 'What if I had said no?' 'About the apartment, you mean?'
example.tran: “我要是说了不呢？”“你是说公寓那件事吗？”

entry.def: If you  describe someone as mean, you are being critical of them because they are unwilling to spend much money or to use very much of a particular thing.

example.ex: Don't be mean with fabric, otherwise curtains will end up looking skimpy.
example.tran: 别这么吝啬布料，不然做出来的窗帘会显得特寒酸。

entry.def: If you describe an amount as mean, you are saying that it is very small.

example.ex: ...the meanest grant possible from the local council.
example.tran: 从地方委员会可能获得的微乎其微的拨款

entry.def: If someone is being mean, they are being unkind to another person, for example by not allowing them to do something.

example.ex: The little girls had locked themselves in upstairs because Mack had been mean to them...
example.tran: 小姑娘们把自己锁在楼上，因为麦克对她们很刻薄。

example.ex: I'd feel mean saying no.
example.tran: 拒绝的话我说不出口。

entry.tran: （指人或动物）脾气极坏的，残忍的
entry.def: If you describe a person or animal as mean, you are saying that they are very bad-tempered and cruel.

example.ex: ...the meanest fighter in the world.
example.tran: 世界上最残忍的斗士

entry.def: If you describe a place as mean, you think that it looks poor and dirty.

example.ex: He was raised on the mean streets of the central market district of Panama City.
example.tran: 他从小在巴拿马城中心闹市区的穷街陋巷里长大。

entry.def: You can use mean in expressions such as 'He plays a mean trumpet' and 'She mixes a mean cocktail' to indicate that someone does something extremely well.

example.ex: He cooks a mean salmon...
example.tran: 他烧鲑鱼的水平一流。

example.ex: Marge played a mean game of tennis.
example.tran: 玛吉打得一手好网球。

entry.tran: 高水平的;上乘的;优秀的
entry.def: You can use no mean in expressions such as 'no mean writer' and 'no mean golfer' to indicate that someone does something well.

example.ex: She was no mean performer on a variety of other instruments...
example.tran: 许多别的乐器她也演奏得相当出色。

example.ex: Moreover, Ramsay was no mean thinker himself.
example.tran: 而且拉姆齐自己也是一位出色的思想家。

entry.def: You can use no mean in expressions such as 'no mean achievement' and 'no mean task' to indicate that someone has done something they deserve to be proud of.

example.ex: To destroy 121 enemy aircraft is no mean record...
example.tran: 歼灭121架敌机是一个了不起的纪录。

example.ex: Repton reached the final, and since around 1,500 schools entered the competition, that was no mean achievement.
example.tran: 雷普顿进入了决赛，鉴于有1,500所左右的学校参与了角逐，能够取得这样的成绩相当了不起。

entry.def: The mean is a number that is the average of a set of numbers.

example.ex: Take a hundred and twenty values and calculate the mean.
example.tran: 取120个值计算平均数。

example.ex: ...the mean score for 26-year-olds.
example.tran: 26岁年龄组的平均分数

means.word_mean: 1. an average of n numbers computed by adding some function of the numbers and dividing by some function of n
1. mean or intend to express or convey;

sentences.sentence: "The water shortage means that we have to stop taking long showers"
"An example sentence would show what this word means"

means.word_mean: 4. have in mind as a purpose;

sentences.sentence: "We thought to return early that night"

means.word_mean: 5. have a specified degree of importance;

sentences.sentence: "I'm thinking of good food when I talk about France"
"Yes, I meant you when I complained about people who gossip!"

means.word_mean: 7. destine or designate for a certain purpose;
1. approximating the statistical norm or average or expected value;

sentences.sentence: "the average income in New England is below that of the nation"

means.word_mean: 3. having or showing an ignoble lack of honor or morality;

sentences.sentence: "that liberal obedience without which your army would be a base rabble"- Edmund Burke
"chok'd with ambition of the meaner sort"- Shakespeare
"something essentially vulgar and meanspirited in politics"

means.word_mean: 5. marked by poverty befitting a beggar;
6. used of persons or behavior; characterized by or indicative of lack of generosity;
7. used of sums of money; so small in amount as to deserve contempt

example.en: Mean green won out over neighborhood purity in the end.
example.zh: 人情到头来再纯正也敌不过金钱。

example.en: He's as mean as a louse with money matters.
example.zh: 他在金钱问题上吝啬到了极点。

auth_sentence.content: I mean practically how do you test for it?
auth_sentence.res_content: I mean practically how do you test for it?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I mean practically how do you test for it?

auth_sentence.content: But that does not mean it could not happen.
auth_sentence.res_content: But that does not mean it could not happen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But that does not mean it could not happen.

auth_sentence.content: We don't mean that we never make mistakes.
auth_sentence.res_content: We don't mean that we never make mistakes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We don't mean that we never make mistakes.

stems_affixes.word_buile: mean中间+time时间→n.其间, 其时 adv.其间
mean中间+while时间→n.其间, 其时 adv.其间

stems_affixes.value_cn: 平均数, 中间, 中庸
stems_affixes.word_buile: mean中间→n.平均数, 中间, 中庸
mean中间+time时间→n.其间, 其时 adv.其间
mean中间+while时间→n.其间, 其时 adv.其间

sentences.en: In this poem the budding flower means youth.
sentences.cn: 在这首诗里含苞欲放的花朵是指青春。

sentences.en: The sign means that cars cannot enter.
sentences.cn: 这种标志表示汽车不能入内。

means.word_mean: 本意是, 原意为; 意味

sentences.en: When we say yes, we mean it.
sentences.cn: 我们说同意就同意。

sentences.en: I did not mean you.
sentences.cn: 我不是指你。

sentences.en: These new orders for our manufactures will mean working overtime.
sentences.cn: 这些订购我们产品的新订单意味着要加班。

sentences.en: He means you no harm.
sentences.cn: 他对你没有恶意。

sentences.en: He that promises too much means nothing.
sentences.cn: 许愿过多的人是不打算兑现的。

sentences.en: I mean to stay here, if I can.
sentences.cn: 若是能留下, 我想留在这儿。

sentences.en: I mean this house for my daughter.
sentences.cn: 我打算把这房子给我的女儿。

sentences.en: In running a company, strict financial management means everything.
sentences.cn: 经营一家公司, 严格的财务管理是至关重要的。

sentences.en: I must tell you that I mean what I say.
sentences.cn: 我得告诉你, 我说话是算数的。

means.word_mean: 打算或注定要某人成为或做某事

sentences.en: I was never meant for the army.
sentences.cn: 我根本就不是当兵的材料。

sentences.en: He means his son to be a doctor.
sentences.cn: 他要儿子当医生。

sentences.en: He is a mean man.
sentences.cn: 他是个自私的人。

sentences.en: Her husband is rather mean over money matters.
sentences.cn: 她的丈夫在金钱方面非常小气。

sentences.en: He's too mean to make a donation.
sentences.cn: 他很小气, 不肯捐款。

sentences.en: He took a mean advantage of me.
sentences.cn: 他利用卑鄙的手段占我的便宜。

sentences.en: Corruption and bribery are mean.
sentences.cn: 贪污行贿是可鄙的。

sentences.en: It was mean of her to say that.
sentences.cn: 她那样说是刻薄的。

sentences.en: The mean temperature of this area is 33 degrees in summer.
sentences.cn: 这个地区夏季平均气温为33度。

sentences.en: He is a man of mean birth.
sentences.cn: 他是位出身低微的人。

sentences.en: What you do first is to calculate the mean.
sentences.cn: 你要做的第一件事就是算出平均数。

sentences.en: It's a question of finding the mean between too lenient treatment and too severe punishment.
sentences.cn: 问题是要找出处理过宽和处罚过严的折中办法。

jushi.english: She said Tuesday, but meant Thursday.
jushi.chinese: 她想说星期四却说成了星期二。
